briefdescription.para: Checks other matrix size for operators.
throws exception if matrix is not a square

detaileddescription.para:
Usage: var::matrix<int>m(2,3);//2rows,3colums
r
number of rows
c
number of colums

briefdescription.para: Default construct a new matrix object.
Mainly invoked for the ranged for loop.

listitem.para: Unlike the [] operator this does index checking

briefdescription.para: Returns the row at an index.
Returns the column at an index.

detaileddescription.para:
!!! warning "Warning"
This resets all elements in the matrix

briefdescription.para: Inserts row at the end or the matrix.
Inserts column at the end of the matrix.
Does operations on a specefic column.

detaileddescription.para:
LAMBDA
std::function
j
column index
f
function to change column elements
!!! warning "Exception"
All row and column operations (inserting, removing .. etc) throw an std::invalid_argument if: 1. There is a size mismatch 2. Invalid index

briefdescription.para: Function operation on all of the matrix.
Combines the rows of another matrix.
Combines the columns of another matrix.

listitem.para: other must have same number of rows

briefdescription.para: Returns if the matrix is empty or not.
Checks if matrix is an identity matrix.

listitem.para: Does not check the correct row and colum index;

briefdescription.para: matrix+var as var as added to all elements
